doc.name: iphoneRequestProductDetails
doc.summary: Sends a request to the iOS App Store for localized product details.

description.overview: Use the iphoneRequestProductDetails command to request localized product details from the App Store.

parameter.name: product
parameter.description: The identifier of the product for which you wish to retrieve the details.

description.comments: The iphoneRequestProductDetails command sends a request for localized product details to the App Store.
